Furthermore, the restrictions have caused a huge strain on the economy, with many businesses suffering losses due to the lack of tourists and travelers. As the number of cases continues to rise in the US, it is important that the government takes a more measured and effective approach to tackling the pandemic. Travel restrictions and quarantines may seem like a quick fix, but in reality, they are proving to be counterproductive and harmful to the economy.
